lines.text: Oh, by Jove, glad you mentioned it, old boy. She wrote and asked me down on Saturday. Said, eh, said she was having some friends for the week-end.
Yes?
Eh, oh, eh, oh, eh, look here, dear old boy, I, I, I shouldn't have told you that. Eh, this puts me up the pole, most frightfully.
How's that?
Eh, your mother said it was to be a surprise.
Well, that's alright. I won't let you down. I'll be surprised.
That's awful descent of you, old boy. Awfully! Well, I must be toddling. See you on Saturday! Toodle-loo.
Why, hello.
Hello.
This is a surprise.
Rather.
Well, I say, I must know something about you. Your phone number or something?
Very well. Mayfair double-nine, nine, one.
I say, eh, look here Sylvia. Don't you think it'd be a rather a wease if you paid, eh, a spot of attention to me? Dash it all, I mean.
Live while we may, that's my motto.
She turfed me, old boy. I, I mean to say she chucked me!
Sylvia?
Who else? Who else, but Sylvia! But, then, I'm a mere mortal. I, I mean to say, I, I seek the flame again. Toodle-loo.
Toodle-loo.
Oh, Jack! Yoo-hoo! Hello, darling. Where have you been?
Yes, where have I been?
You naughty boy.
Have a drink.
Right. Not too much now, I might forget myself.
Cheer-o!
Cheer-o!
You're going to stay very close to me tonight, little devil.
We're off to France. Go on, change your clothes. I'll tell mother.
Be down in a jiffy!
Right!
Are we ready?
[Group of soldiers all reply Yes sir]
Come on, me lads!
[Soldiers jump out of the trench and race towards the battlefield]
See you later.
Right-o.
40 tomorrow night, your batteries will move up and occupy these positions.
Yes sir.
Then, when Jerry attacks in force, your battery, Bradford, will fall back.
Retreat, sir?
Don't be so infernally British, Bradford. As an assault to your patriotism, you may be interested to hear that we intend to drive a wedge into the right flank of the German advance.
Oh, I see sir. Then, my retreat is only a blind.
Exactly.
Misunderstanding? It's as clear as a star shell! She's chucked me and, and you've chucked me.
